text: qalt aimra'at aleaziz llnswt allaati qttaen aydyhn: fhdha aldhy asabkn fi rwytkn 'iiaah ma asabkn hu alfataa aladhi lumtunnany fi alafttan bh, walaqad tlbth wahawalat 'ighra'h; lystjyb li famtne waba, walayin lam yafeal ma amuruh bih mustaqbalaan layeaqabann bidukhul alsjn, wlaykwnn min aladhla'
